MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Chwilog. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:53pm. We have unconfirmed reports of 3rd party damage to an underground cable and we suspect that your property is affected by this. Our engineers are on their way to confirm this report and the team will work get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:33pm on 10th November 2020
